title: More Plus Liquid Detergent
description: Liquid detergent for deep cleaning, formulated to remove tough stains and provide a fresh fragrance. Net volume 1 liter.
usage: Used for machine and hand washing of clothes.

title: More Plus Detergent Bar
description: Powerful detergent bar that removes stains effectively from clothes.
usage: Best for washing clothes by hand.

title: More Plus Dishwash Bar
description: Tough on grease and gentle on hands, gives sparkling clean dishes.

title: More Plus Fabric Softener
description: Keeps clothes soft, fresh, and fragrant after every wash.
usage: Used after washing clothes to soften fabric.

title: More Plus Hand Wash
description: Kills 99.9% germs while keeping hands soft and moisturized.

title: More Plus Phenyl
description: Disinfectant floor cleaner with strong germ-killing formula.
usage: Used for floor and surface cleaning.

title: More Plus Washing Soap
description: Washing soap bar made with a coconut oil formula for expert-quality cleaning on all types of fabric.
usage: Best for washing clothes by hand.

title: More Plus Washing Powder
description: Washing powder with a smart formula for brilliant cleaning and 99.9% germ removal.
usage: Used for machine and hand washing of clothes.
